post:
Hi all!

we have a special shared hosting offer hosted in our new location (Interxion, Madrid).

Just **10 €/year** for a WHM / cPanel reseller hosting account with **2 GB of NVMe disk space**.

You will receive access on a **WHM panel** and you will be able to create up to 25 cPanel accounts.

The server is protected with CloudLinux + CageFS

- Disk: 2 GB NVMe
- Transfer: 250 GB/mes
- cPanel accounts: 25
- Reseller WHM: YES
- Subdominios: Unlimited
- Email accounts: Unlimited
- Bases MySQL: Unlimited
- IPs: Shared IP, 1 dedicated IP: 3€/month
- FreeSSL: YES
- PHP 7 by default (PHP 5.4, 5.5 and 5.6 available)

Looking glass: http://mad.ginernet.com

ORDER: https://ginernet.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=175
